# dependencytrack_oidc_group (Resource)

Manages a OIDC Group.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the OIDC Group.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) UUID for the OIDC Group as generated by DependencyTrack.
